meanings.definition: The central cylindrical core of an ear of corn, on which the kernels grow.
meanings.sent1: I picked the corncobs from the cornstalks in the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested the corncobs to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the corncobs as a makeshift ladder to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like scattered corncobs, each representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The children played a game where they tossed corncobs into buckets to score points.
